name: No Match
description:
Never pick the same card twice in a round. It sounds simple, but remember that the bank always wins! Challenge your memory skills and enjoy 50 hand crafted levels.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 50 edition in 72h. Link to the jam

Theme : Delay the inevitable

Team : Luc Francey, Elio Ramel

Controls : Mouse, left click only
